column3: When wearing no armor, light armor, or medium armor your base speed is +10 faster than normal.

For 4 (CON Mod) combat rounds a day you may choose to gain a +4 morale bonus to Strength and Constitution and a +2 morale bonus to Will saves; HOWEVER, you will suffer a penalty of -2 to Armor Class. See Paizo page for full description.
You may make all Knowledge skill checks untrained. Additionally, add half of your level to Knowledge skill checks.
For 4 (CHA Mod) combat rounds a day you may use any of the performances you have mastered. See Paizo page for full description.
If your deity is Chaotic, Evil, Good, or Lawful you gain an aura. See Paizo page for full description.
You may release a wave of energy that provides various bonuses depending on alignment. See Paizo page for full description.

If you are Good: you may cast a healing spell that you did not prepare, and you may convert prepared spells into cure spells. If you are Evil: you may convert cure spells into inflict spells. Otherwise: you must make a choice on how to convert spells.
Gain +2 bonus on Knowledge (Nature) and Survival skill checks.
You may cast a summoning spell that you did not prepare, and you may convert prepared spells of a rank into the corresponding rank of Summon Nature's Ally.
Roll 1D20 + Level (CHA Mod) to determine if you can improve the attitude of an animal.
When unarmored and unencumbered you may add (WIS Mod) to your AC and CMD.
You may make one additional attack per combat round, taking a -2 penalty on your Attack Roll.
You gain the effects of Improved Unarmed Strike.
